mapper.select: select year(operation_time) as "year",sex as "sex",count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from hospital_business inner join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation = "就医服务" group by year,sex order by year,sex

select year(operation_time) as "year",count(distinct hospital_business.social_security_card) as "person_num",count(person.social_security_card) as "person_sum" from hospital_business inner join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card and hospital_business.area = person.area where operation = "就医服务" and hospital_business.area = "${address}" group by year order by year

select year(operation_time) as "year", case when (year(operation_time)-year(birthday)>65) then "66岁以上（老年）" when (year(operation_time)-year(birthday)>40) then "41-65岁（中年）" when (year(operation_time)-year(birthday)>6) then "7-40岁（青年）" else "0-6岁（儿童）" end as "age", count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from hospital_business inner join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation = "就医服务" group by year,age order by year,age
